attributes.additional_details:
All minors (children under 18) must be at home/private residence by 2400hrs unless accompanied by an adult. Failure to do so would result in a fine for parents/carers and ASBO or similar punishment (increased curfew) for the minor/s.

In a hope to educate our youth and to teach discipline, respect and morals.

40% rise in violent crime by U-18 (2008)
(http://www.guardian.co.uk/uk/2008/may/16/ukcrime.gender)
